About us

Who are we

We are students majoring in Computer Science and Engineering in Southern University and Technology, Shenzhen, Guangdong, China.

Our groups have fives developers:

Why this project

This is a project for our course CS309 Object oriented analysis and design . And we also plan to use this project to competting in SCORE 2018.

See the project we choose at: NewMonopoly

If you are interested in this project, welcome to contact us on Github. Like us? Support us through Alipay
